2025-05-07.title: Amazon to Invest More Than $4 Billion to Launch Infrastructure Region in Chile
2025-05-07.description: New AWS South America (Chile) Region will enable customers to run workloads and securely store their content in Chile while serving end users with even lower latency Active customers in Chile include AgroSuper, Andres Bello University, Banco de Chile, Banco I…

2025-05-08.title: The construction of a road in Brazil draws criticism before first-ever climate talks in the Amazon
2025-05-08.description: BELEM, Brazil (AP) — In the run-up to the annual U.N. climate conference, set to take place in Brazil’s Amazon in November, the construction of a road is drawing attention, with critics arguing it will lead to environmental degradation. Before the talks, call…
